body: # Interactive Slider Interactive slide is a small tool that helps to make any of the feature in your website beautiful. I used it to boost my skills section of my portfolio, and then realized that some of my friends really liked it and did one for their own. So, this tiny tool will really boost your web skills. ## Getting started To use this tool, all you need is to download *interactive.js* and *interactive.css*. Put the CSS and JS files in their respective folder. The folder structures vary with your preferred way. For example, *ExpressJS* will generate the path for JS files and CSS files to > mainProject/public/javascripts > > mainProject/public/stylesheets You can directly copy the code below and place it inside `` of your html document.
